recipe_name: Spicy kale with tomato and onion
author: Paul Rankin
method: Heat the oil in a pan over a medium heat and fry the onion and garlic for 2-3 minutes, to soften. Add the ground cumin, ground coriander and chilli flakes, stir well, and cook for a further 1-2 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and blanched kale and continue to cook for 2-3 minutes or until heated through. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, peeled, finely sliced,  1 garlic clove, peeled, finely sliced,  ½ tsp ground cumin,  ½ tsp ground coriander,  pinch chilli flakes,  1  tomato, seeds removed, chopped,  85g/3oz kale, washed, thick stalks removed, roughly sliced, blanched for 2-3 minutes in salted water, drained,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
